title: Listening spelling 1

items.title: Giving personal information at the library

content.body:
Lucy goes to the school library to get a library card.

What does the school librarian ask/say?

Fill in the missing words.

Hello, what is name?

And what is your , Lucy?

Can you that?

Thank you. class are you in?

And old are you, Lucy?

Have you a photo?

Thank you. Here's your school card.
